category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_use_MDS_import_XSL_config_file
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether to use the XML file specified in the IMDS_MDS_import_XSL_config_file preference to import a material data sheet (MDS). The default value is false.
